column4: crap
does anyone have this problem:  sound is fine within Ubuntu but as soon as I seek sound out on the web it's spotty at best
hmmm... or... does anyone know where I can get information about sound problems?
does anyone know when the final release of breezy will be out?
mid oct i think
thanks
in the browser maybe
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/EasyPalmDeviceSetup?highlight=%28palm%29
I get the hotsync utility to see my palm... that's not the problem.
I went ahead and made the changes the article suggested...
I'll let you know in a minute if it helped any.
edit /etc/apt/sources.list
that didn't work
how didn't it work?
i'm getting edit Warning: unknown mime-type for "/etc/apt/sources.list" -- using "application/*"
try this in terminal: sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
thank you
how do i force quite an app?
add the force quit button to your panel and use that
thank you ... that worked!
np
synaptic runs with sudo priveleges, thype this into a terminal: sudo killall -9 synaptic
i'll try that next time if it happens ;)
